results.text: Personal Vendetta! This one deserved it as the Riff deals an additional [[1D4]] damage.
Songs of Healing. The Riff heals the party for [[/roll 1D4]] lost HP per Ally.
Holy Metal! The pureness of the Riff is recognized by higher lifeforms. In addition to playing the riff, the Noise Thrasher casts the Holy Smiter prayer Make A Stand at the same time.
Calling Hell World Collect. The darkness of the Riff taps into the Khaos winds granting the Noise Thrasher the ability to cast a War Wizard Level 1 spell at random.
The Riff becomes cosmic and summons [[1D4]] Otherworldly Spawns to do the Noise Thrasher's bidding.
Anthem! The Riff is the skumdog Party's favorite jam! Granting allies a +3 to attack and Damage on their next turn.
Double The Pain. The Riff is cast flawlessly and deals 2 times the damage. If no damage is dealt with the riff, the duration is doubled without the need to spend any additional Riff Points.
Double The Pleasure. The Riff goes off without a hitch. So well in fact it heals the party for the amount of damage dealt times 2.
Air Guitar Madness. Mimicking the Riff while playing it, the Noise Thrasher unlocks their mind's eye casting a random level 1 Psychic Manifestation at the same time.
Synth-Metal Hybrid attack! As the Riff is played, it harmonizes with the computer waves casting a random level 1 Hack at the same time.

Freedom Fireworks. The Riff is sounding like the Detroit-Prime Anthem as it spews Madballz Missiles out of the Sick Instrument. 6 Madballz Missiles shoot out hitting any target the Noise Thrasher chooses dealing [[/roll 1D4]] per dart.
Extreme Noise Terror! A sound screeches out of the Sick Instrument. It's loud and annoying and all enemies within earshot (100ft) must roll on the Fear Table against the Noise Thrasher.
The intensity of the Riff is so gnarly it knocks the eyes out of the target's eye sockets. They are Blinded and take an additional [[1D10]] damage.
Napalm Death. The Riff is cast and deals an additional [[/roll 2D6]] Burning damage to the target and any other enemies within 10ft of the original target. Burning their insides to a crisp.

Quantum Overload. The sick instrument itself magnifies the damage dealing 3 times the pain! If the riff does no damage, extend the duration to 3 turns without having to pay any additional Riff Points.
Mega Sonic Echo. It's as if the Riff is played twice making a copy of itself, and the Noise Thrasher can choose a new target for the copy! (Or send 'em both straight at the first target).
Ultimate Morale Boost! The Riff is so sick that it pumps the skumdog party up so much that they all regain [[/roll 1D8]] lost Class Points.
Sick Sax Solo. Accompanied with the Riff is a ethereal out of body Sax Solo that pierces the target's ear drums in such an intense manner it blows their mind dealing an additional [[1D8]] damage.
Black Metal Veins. The Riff from Hell World. As it's played it casts three Level 4 War Wizard spells at the same time. Spells chosen by the Noise Thrasher.

ELECTRIC DRAGON 80,000 VOLTS!!!! The Riff is beyond powerful and manifests itself as a Electric Dragon! The massive beast bites the head off the target killing them instantly while shooting lightning bolts up to 30ft away. Any enemy within a 30ft radius of the target must make an [[/save agility]] or take [[/roll 1D6x6]] damage.
